manipulators.description: Change caps_lock to control when used as modifier, escape when used alone
Semicolon + m -> Mute Google Meet in Chrome
h + ; -> VSCode go to route handler
h + ; + j -> VSCode go to route handler from clipboard
Space + h + ; -> Open correlationId from clipboard in Honeycomb
[ + ] -> Move focus to the Menu Bar
cmd + [ + ] -> Toggle status bar in VSCode
Semicolon + f in FireFox Developer Edition -> Cmd+`
Semicolon + c in Google Chrome -> Cmd+`
Semicolon + v in Visual Studio Code -> Cmd+`
Semicolon + q in Axe-Edit III -> Cmd+`
